main.name: Shadab Gada
main.bio: Hi there !! Thank you for coming :) I am an enthusiastic Software Engineer with experience in designing and developing applications in test-driven environment adhering to coding standards to ensure high code quality. Worked with US-based clients in an Agile environment and participated in various sprint activities such as Sprint planning, Stand-up, and sprint retrospective. Currently, I am working in reputed Multinational Company Persistent Systems Ltd. Here, I am having an amazing time and experience in terms of learning as well as working as I got an opportunity to work with excellent mentors and in a creative and challenging environment.  I love to explore and work on multiple technologies which is why I am always working on some of the other projects. In my free time I love to watch interesting videos on YouTube, Also I love to Travel :)
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

accomplishments.title: Best Intern Award
accomplishments.desc: Worked as Full Stack Intern to develop a responsive news portal for a local company. Being a first industrial experience, I learned a lot in terms of technology as well as the professional culture required in the Industry.

accomplishments.title: Best Performer Award
accomplishments.desc: Demonstrated the hands-on problem statements and innovative ideas related to IOT Workshop held at Rajarambapu Insititute

accomplishments.title: Award for Innovation
accomplishments.desc: Final Year Project Work entitled Hand Gesture Recognition was awarded for innovation on the occasion of GRADUATION DAY ceremony

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
